meanings.definition: A benign tumor containing skin elements such as hair, sweat glands, and sebaceous glands.
meanings.sent1: The doctor explained that a dermoid is a type of tumor with skin components.
meanings.sent2: She had surgery to remove the dermoid from her abdomen.
meanings.sent3: The dermoid tumor was so friendly, it even grew a little smile!
meanings.sent4: The dermoid felt like a tiny skin garden inside her body.
meanings.sent5: The dermoid looked like a tiny skin zoo under the microscope.

meanings.definition: Of or relating to a dermoid tumor.
meanings.sent1: The dermoid growth was carefully monitored by the medical team.
meanings.sent2: Her dermoid condition required regular check-ups.
meanings.sent3: The dermoid tumor threw a party, inviting all the other cells to join!
meanings.sent4: The dermoid nature of the growth made it unique among tumors.
meanings.sent5: The dermoid characteristics of the tumor made it easily recognizable.
